TITLE Thai Chicken Breasts with Herb Lemongrass

{[Marinade]
# In a blender combine: [1.25 cup fresh cilantro ], [0.75 cup coconut milk], [1/4 cup [chopped] lemongrass], [12 item fresh basil leaves], [3 item Thai bird chiles], [3 cloves garlic], [1.5 tbl kosher salt], [2 tsp [packed] light brown sugar], and [1.5 tsp freshly ground black pepper].
# Puree until smooth.
}
{[Chicken]
# Arrange [5 lbs chicken breast] in a nonreactive baking dish or other vessel large enough to accommodate them in a snug single layer. # Pour the $[Marinade] over the breasts and turn to coat them well. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours and up to 1 day.
# Grill chicken.
}
# Sprinkle with [1/4 cup [chopped] fresh cilantro] and serve with [2 item lime wedges].
